snippet: For Sonya Ortiz, 18, being a dance soloist and performing at Radio City Music Hall were steps toward her proudest achievement, getting into college.
abstract: Federation of Protestant Welfare Agencies, one of seven agencies supported by The New York Times Neediest Cases Fund, helps dancer Sonya Ortiz, homeless since age 3, pay for college.
lead_paragraph: For Sonya Ortiz, 18, being a dance soloist and performing at Radio City Music Hall were steps toward her proudest achievement, getting into college.

headline.print_headline: Without a Home, a Dancer Finds Her Way to the Stage and an Education
headline.main: A Dancer Is Driven to Succeed After a Homeless Childhood

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: New York Times Neediest Cases Fund
